definition: festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: The dissertation consists of introduction and four parts.
sentences.chinese: 全文分爲緒論和四個主要章節。

sentences.english: The remainder of this section introduces those models.
sentences.chinese: 本章節的剩餘內容介紹了這些模型。

sentences.english: Other chapters are available in our e-Library.
sentences.chinese: 在隨後的章節裏，我們將分別考察每一個因素。

sentences.english: InfoQ brings you an  exclusive pdf chapter excerpt from this new book.
sentences.chinese: InfoQ爲您獨家帶來本書的章節節選。

sentences.english: The journey of the west consists has many characters, mostly mythical creatures.
sentences.chinese: 西遊記包括許多章節，大部分虛構的生物。

sentences.english: The Testing Chapter will give you more back- ground on these problems ?
sentences.chinese: 專門有測試的章節提供這個領域的問題。

sentences.english: Investigation and collection of the Aerolite.
sentences.chinese: 隕石的研究和收藏等若干章節。

sentences.english: An example of acceptance test report is presented in the next sections.
sentences.chinese: 在以下章節中將會給出驗收測試報告的例子。

sentences.english: This chapter is only overture. Thenext is the flower of the film.
sentences.chinese: 這章節只是引子，接下來的纔是電影的看點。

sentences.english: He posts his novels chapter by chapter or in sections online under different pseudonyms as he writes.
sentences.chinese: 他用不同的筆名把他的作品分章節發佈在網上。

sentences.english: Read the comics every day and cut out the ones that remind you of your life.
sentences.chinese: 每天看一些漫畫書，剪切那些和你的生活相關的章節。

sentences.english: Chapters are well organized and most are self-contained.
sentences.chinese: 各章節的內容組織良好，內容完整。

sentences.english: The first six chapters are the gold of this volume.
sentences.chinese: 開始的六個章節是本卷書的精華所在。

sentences.english: Another passage from The Seven-Pointed Star came back to him.
sentences.chinese: 又一段七點星的章節浮現與他腦海。

sentences.english: May be, Love 1s on1y a chapter 1n a guy's l1fe.
sentences.chinese: 或許，愛情只是男人生命的一個章節。

sentences.english: A section is a subelement of a chapter.

definition: to include (in a collection)/to put together (stories, poems etc)/to record/to employ/to recruit
entire book/unabridged book/entire multi-volume work/comprehensive volume
to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
